original_text: And when they lifted up their eyes afar off, and knew him not, they lifted up their voice, and wept; and they rent every one his mantle, and sprinkled dust upon their heads toward heaven.
korean_text: 눈을 들어 멀리 보매 그가 욥인 줄 알기 어렵게 되었으므로 그들이 일제히 소리 질러 울며 각각 자기의 겉옷을 찢고 하늘을 향하여 티끌을 날려 자기 머리에 뿌리고

sentences.original_text: And when they lifted up their eyes afar off
and they rent every one his mantle
and sprinkled dust upon their heads toward heaven
